BetterMe: Mental Health

Brief: BetterMe: Mental Health is designed as a personal meditation assistant, encouraging individuals who struggle with traditional meditation practices. By dedicating only a few minutes each day, users can achieve tranquility, well-being, and a balanced lifestyle with this app's guided meditations and practical techniques.
